channel.title: Router on YSMILES HOME
channel.description: Recent content in Router on YSMILES HOME

item.title: Multiple routers bridge connection
item.description: I have 2 wireless routers (R1, R2) in my local area network (LAN). R1 is the main router, has IP 192.168.0.1 and DHCP address pool 192.168.0.100~199. R2 is in bridge mode and connects with R1. R2 has IP 192.168.1.253, and DHCP address pool 192.168.1.100~199 (actually DHCP service is now disabled automatically). I have a problem. When I use a device, say my PC, to connect to Internet from R2, I get an IP 192.
